title: RBI plans to implement uniform licensing for online and offline payment aggregators
description: The Reserve Bank of India will streamline its licensing process for payment aggregators by merging requirements for online and offline entities. This unified license aims to facilitate seamless operations across both domains. The RBI stresses the need for secure transactions and plans to integrate Aadhaar-enabled Payment Systems with POS machines to boost financial inclusion in rural areas.
